overview: Itâ€™s 1849. After months alone in a mining camp, Tex, Sparky, Jebediah, William, Jonesy, and Jess have begun to practice active listening, normalize platonic affection, and treat each other with kindness and care. They have even made a chore wheel. But can their new anti-patriarchal lifestyle survive when they get invited to a party in town- with girls?
title: Men Among Men
